tool_description: Simple API to convert audio/video file formats
name: Audio/Video Converter
title: Audio/Video Converter

api_list.name: checkStatusById
api_list.description: Returns the status and download link of a previously initiated conversion.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://audio-video-converter.p.rapidapi.com/av/status/4c9c6cec236ca92edcedc64223bbaa318f30efee65f73e0c2c672465c2f4527d3291cad78594c86b439e372cb38b2ea5026d3e48365302c5630316ee14ec292e/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "audio-video-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://audio-video-converter.p.rapidapi.com/av/status/{id}/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "audio-video-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
